title: Cannot connect to game and now not support! WHAT IS HAPPENING
body:
Heyya! 

Something is weird. I can't play anymore. Connection issues deluxe for a week. Live in sweden.  This hilarious thing popped up when trying to access support for my well, support ticket. Hhaha. 
First Riot games 101 error logo and then: 

503 Service Unavailable

No server is available to handle this request.

It is kind of funny, in a boring way. Why is this happening!? Servers overloaded? It is not the net provider sadly, something with riot's servers they have concluded after analysis /my net.

replies.body:
I'm not seeing any listed outages for the support site being completely down in EUW. There were a few issues that could have prevented logging in, but should still be able to load the support site.  Are you still not able to log in at all? 

As to the connection issues themselves, looks like it's already en route to one of our tech specialists who should be able to help troubleshoot.  Lemme know if you still can't access the support site!
